cli_script
Here is the equivalent CLI script:\n\n```bash\n#!/bin/bash\n\n# Define parameters\nvmDiagnosticsStorageAccountName="zytest"\nadminUsername="zytest"\nadminPassword="zytest"\ndnsNameForPublicIP="zytest"\nwindowsOSVersion="2012-R2-Datacenter"\nlocation="westus"\nvmSize="Standard_D2s_v3"\nstorageAccountEndpoint=""\n\n# Create a storage account\naz storage account create --name $vmDiagnosticsStorageAccountName --location $location --sku Standard_LRS\n\n# Create a public IP address\naz network public-ip create --name myPublicIP --location $location --allocation-method Dynamic --dns-name $dnsNameForPublicIP\n\n# Create a virtual network\naz network vnet create --name MyVNET --location $location --address-prefix 10.0.0.0/16 --subnet-name Subnet --subnet-prefix 10.0.0.0/24\n\n# Create a network interface\naz network nic create --name myVMNic --location $location --vnet-name MyVNET --subnet Subnet --public-ip-address myPublicIP\n\n# Create a virtual machine\naz vm create --name MyVM --location $location --size $vmSize --image MicrosoftWindowsServer:WindowsServer:$windowsOSVersion:latest --admin-username $adminUsername --admin-password $adminPassword --nics myVMNic --storage-account $vmDiagnosticsStorageAccountName\n\n# Enable boot diagnostics for the virtual machine\naz vm boot-diagnostics enable --name MyVM --storage $vmDiagnosticsStorageAccountName\n\n# Add extension to the virtual machine\naz vm extension set --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Diagnostics --name IaaSDiagnostics --version 1.4 --vm-name MyVM --settings \'{"xmlCfg": "[base64(variables(\'wadcfgx\'))]", "StorageAccount": "$vmDiagnosticsStorageAccountName"}\' --protected-settings \'{"storageAccountName": "$vmDiagnosticsStorageAccountName", "storageAccountKey": "[listKeys(variables(\'accountid\'),\'2015-05-01-preview\').key1]", "storageAccountEndPoint": "$storageAccountEndpoint"}\'\n```\n\nPlease replace the placeholder values with your actual values before running the script.
